achievements.title: Erfolge
achievements.noAchievements: Noch keine Erfolge erzielt. Klicke weiter!

messages.prophecy: The ancient clicking prophecy begins to unfold...
messages.cosmic: The cosmic clicksters would be proud of your progress!
messages.astral: The clicking echoes through the astral plane...
messages.speaking: Wait... did you hear that? The clicks are speaking to me...
messages.ancient: Your clicking resonates with ancient power!
messages.sages: The Click Sages whisper of your potential...
messages.demons: BEHOLD! The Click Demons arise from their slumber!
messages.veil: Your clicks pierce the veil of reality!
messages.spirits: The Click Spirits dance to your rhythm...
messages.council: The Grand Click Council has noticed your dedication
messages.void: The clicking void gazes back at you...
messages.runes: Ancient click runes glow with your power!
messages.beast: THREE THREE THREE - THE NUMBER OF THE CLICK BEAST
messages.prophets: The Click Prophets sing of your coming!
messages.dimensions: Your clicks echo through the dimensions...
messages.portal: Your clicks have opened a portal to the Click Dimension!
messages.sacrifice: The ancient Click Gods demand MORE SACRIFICE
messages.jackpot: JACKPOT! The Click Casino welcomes its newest champion!
messages.unmatched: 你的点击力量无人能及! (Your click power is unmatched!)
messages.reality: Reality itself bends to your clicking will!
messages.elite: YOU HAVE BECOME THE ELITE CLICK MASTER
messages.power: Your clicking power level is over 1500!
messages.devils: The Click Devils bow before your might
messages.lucky: Lucky clicks flow through your veins
messages.dynasty: The Click Dynasty recognizes your supremacy
messages.twoThousand: Two thousand clicks of pure power!
messages.quartet: The prophecy of the Click Quartet is fulfilled
messages.constellation: The Click Constellation aligns in your honor
messages.newDimensions: Your clicking power reaches new dimensions
messages.threshold: Standing at the threshold of click divinity
messages.ultimate: FIVE THOUSAND CLICKS OF ULTIMATE POWER!
messages.force: The Five Fingered Click Force is yours to command
messages.underworld: The Click Underworld crowns you their ruler
messages.infinite: 无限点击力量! (INFINITE CLICKING POWER!)
messages.godhood: YOU HAVE ASCENDED TO CLICK GODHOOD

reset.confirm: Bist du sicher, dass du den gesamten Fortschritt zurücksetzen möchtest? Dies kann nicht rückgängig gemacht werden.
